name: Animal Tragedy
description:
What if hunters were under lockdown due to a pandemic and they couldn't go out ? Imagine how happy the animals would be!

This game is a short interactive fiction about animal-human relations.

Les chasseurs se retrouvent confinés dans leur chalet. Pour les animaux de la forêt c'est la fête ! Mais il ne faut pas se rejouir trop vite. Tout cela n'est malheureusement que temporaire.

Ce jeu est une courte fiction interactive autour de la condition animale.



Controls

Keyboard : Arrows + Enter
Gamepad supported

Languages

English and French

Thanks to

Pierre B. for his precious help on the writing.
Katharine N. for fixing the English version!
Yoann for being my very first beta tester <3

You can follow me on twitter : @Tweedle_Dim

Please let me know in comments if you encounter any bugs.
